name: RINGOӘͶIЯ
description:
RINGOӘͶIЯ is a nice little puzzle game that could cost you a lot of your time and nerves. It requires your full concentration and abstract thinking.

Your goal is to build spheres with rings and match the line of the same color. It is harder than it sounds. As you progress your levels get harder and harder and new colors come into play. Collect points, build spheres and complete the wonderful puzzle that is RINGOӘͶIЯ.
